website_summaries.verdict: An acceptable choice if you need a middle-of-the road option that is practical and affordable.
pros: Similar build/features to models that cost more
Nice pinewood craftsmanship, strong slats, and modern design for a reasonable price
cons: Some reports of pieces breaking during assembly

customer_reviews.title: Great large dog bed!
customer_reviews.text: I know clearly not it’s intened use, but I bought this for my 91lb. 11 month old puppy. And he loves it. It’s durable enough that my 200lb self can lay in it and maybe took me 20-30 min to assemble by myself. It’s all real wood not particle wood thank god. 100% worth the buy. Frank and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect transitional bed for our 2 year old. I had a very easy time putting it together, and it feels very sturdy and secure. I was quite surprised at the quality of the bed for such a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to contact Big Oshi
customer_reviews.text: The bed itself is fine; my complaint is with the "phantom" Big Oshi company. I've attempted to contact them by email (using the URL on their website as well as the one in the manual) and also calling (again two different numbers). The phone just rings and rings - no recorded message or phone tree. All we need is one 2-2/5" Allen head bolt with the corresponding barrel nut! I would NOT recommend this product since it appears to be impossible to contact the manufacturer!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Dean

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy Set up and such a cute bed. My daughter is 1 and 1/2 and can easily climb on and off of it. The side rails are so good so she won't fall off (she moves a lot while she sleeps)
customer_reviews.author: Pfowler

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Easy assembly, looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed 2 months ago, and assembled it and it was used right away. Assembly was easy, the bed looks great and there have been no issues. My daughter decided to start climbing out of her crib, necessitating a change to a toddler bed a little sooner than I'd planned. The kit to convert her crib was over $100- so I went ahead and made the leap and bought this. I figured in the worst case, I'd just upgrade her to a full bed earlier than planned. The bed is fabulous and FAR exceeded my expectations. It looks great, I'm not worried about her falling and is well made. Assembly was extremely easy.
customer_reviews.author: Delilah

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bed
customer_reviews.text: We've had this bed for a little over 6 months now. It's held up great so far. I've had my 25 ish pound son on it and my husband and I sitting on it at the same time with no sign of any stress on it from the weight. I've even laid down completely on it with my son when I was 9 months pregnant. It can hold at least 200+ lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amber L.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This bed is poorly made. Most parts came bowed, and the holes look like they were drilled by a guy in his garage. Paint chips off during assembly. None of the hardware lines up with the holes. The warning stickers are also counterfeit. Do NOT buy this product if you value the safety of your toddler. Made out of VERY cheap wood and hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Mason S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed. Personally preference it needs 4 rails not 2.
customer_reviews.text: 4 rails would give this bed a 5 star rating. This bed is great all around except for one detail. My child tosses and turns in their sleep so an additional rail (one that bolts into top of frame so it can be removed by parent later) toward the foot of the bed would be a great help to ensure they do not roll out of the bed. My child always finds themselves sliding down towards the bottom of the bed then rolling it. Bed is low so no concern of any real danger but trying to mitigate the roll out though.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit leery, considering how inexpensive this bed was, but I knew it was only temporary so there was little risk. Two-and-a-half years later, we are happy to report that this bed was rock-solid and was exactly what we needed as our little one transitioned from a crib to a big-boy bed. The materials are light and "cheap", but our rough-and-tumble little boy jumped and played and sometimes even slept on it and it's still in good shape, minus the places where he pounded on it with toys. It will dent and scratch, but it will hold up under pressure. At least one person in our house is sad to see it go.
customer_reviews.author: B and V

customer_reviews.title: What you pay for. Suited what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we needed a bit flimsy so we will see how long it Lasts. It looks nice and our little girl loves it. It was a pain to put the lats on to it though - I said one too many swear words trying to put that together so thank god my husband stepped in and helped out. They kept falling out as I tried put them all together. Got it in the end and it’s found it’s place In our big girls room.
customer_reviews.author: Karina D

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly & perfect bed!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bed for a toddler! It looks just like the picture. The bed was fairly easy to assemble and took less than 30 minutes. The sides are the perfect height to keep my daughter from rolling out of bed and are low enough at the bottom that she can climb in and out on her own when she needs to. The bed is very sturdy. - low to the ground, so it's easy for her to climb - side guards on the top keep her, her pillow, and her toys - style is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Rahib

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend, pros and cons list.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Lightweight, simple enough instructions, I set it up alone (while 8 months pregnant) and had little trouble doing so! Took no more then 15 mins to build. My 2 year old loves it, so far its pretty durable and I’m happy with the purchase. Cons: there were a few pieces that didn’t line up perfect and that was a little bit of a pain. With the screwing of the 8 screws they aren’t pre drilled which was zero problem for me since I had a drill but this may make it difficult for others. The slants in the base of the bed were a witch to get perfect while assembling alone but manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to be frustrated!
customer_reviews.text: Once put together it's the perfect bed for my almost 2 year old. The cherry color is very nice. However...putting this together is not a one woman job. The directions are near worthless, with the corresponding pictures almost impossible to identify exactly what it is referring to. The self screwing screws are a joke and require a drill, NOT the flathead screwdriver the directions stated I would need. The holes on the frame didnot align perfectly which made construction even more frustrating. If you are a patient person go ahead and purchase. If you are not, I suggest you line up assistance prior to building!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle F

customer_reviews.title: Not a Quick Assembly
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bed in white for our toddler. It arrived with all the pieces included, nothing was damaged or missing. The assembly took about an hour with 2 people; we were not expecting it to take that long. It seems like a sturdy little bed, however, I would not let an adult sit on the end of it to read a bedtime story or otherwise. It does not seem like it would hold up well. Our toddler has used it for about 1 month and she loves it. We really love the railing because we know she won't fall out at night. I would recommend this bed overall!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen I

customer_reviews.title: Not great to assemble. At all!
customer_reviews.text: So my husband and I put this together for my toddler and it was not a great time. The instructions aren’t great and the parts are trash! The wood pegs snapped in half and the holes did not line up at all. We somehow made it work out and got it together but I wouldn’t recommend this bed. It’s cute and modern but not easy to assemble at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Decent bed for the money
customer_reviews.text: I picked this bed because of the many positive reviews. In my opinion, it works best having two people so assemble the bed so the bottom bed rails don't keep falling out while trying to assemble it. Once put together, it looks good and seems sturdy. My daughter loved it! My only issue was one of the center legs were cut incorrectly so the holes did not match up (about an inch off). Amazon fixed my problem. Lastly, if some people are wondering, there is no smell coming off the bed either.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: What i feel is too small but the finishing is good. We are transactions of training toddler from crib to bed bit size is to small. I might will return and just get the twin size. The instructions was not helpfull at all it was wrong printing...same print on all pages. Edit: my toddler slept onky for 2 days and it broke one of the part...picture is attached and i am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tahira

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Granddaughter who is 17 months now. We have had it about 2 months. She loves it! It is a great height for her to get in and out of. She feels special having her own bed. It is super cute. It was easy enough to assemble for my husband and I. I saw a review before I purchased it that some people where complaining about a sticker showing that was hard to remove. The reviewer said to turn that piece in so it wasn't visible. That is what we did. No issues!! Get this bed! It is a great price and great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Tami Ray

customer_reviews.title: 2-piece side rails are a huge weak spot
customer_reviews.text: The bed goes together very well, but the design has a major flaw. Designed to ship easily and fit into a smaller box, the side rails are two piece and are joined by a metal plate of sorts. Our son is 2 years old and maybe 35 pounds, but the weight of him started to bow the side rails. Then, if you happen to be kneeling down to give a kiss goodnight, and put some of your weight on the bed, the rails break. At this point we are trying to decide do we return the bed, and the hassle of disassembly, or do we try to rig it with a reinforcement of some sort. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua D.

customer_reviews.title: Great transition from crib
customer_reviews.text: My older daughter moved into this bed around 2” months from a crib. She still sleeps in it (is now 4 years old). It was an easy transition. The side bars helped her feel secure, and the low height means she can get in and out easily, and doesn’t get hurt if she falls out. Her crib mattress fits. She has always slept well, so I am assuming it’s comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed
customer_reviews.text: How am I supposed to put this thing together when the hole is so off centered that I can't screw it in the bolt?? I will have to return it since I can't put it together safely. Very disappointed as this is the second one I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Elly Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good bed, great price
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my toddler when he was so rough on his crib that it started to fall apart. So far, so good! My husband put it together in an afternoon, and it has survived both of my kids jumping on it. It looks good and my son loves his new bed.
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: Good for price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bed for transitioning from crib to twin. My granddaughter loves her big girl bed. I wouldn't call it heavy duty though. When putting bed together make sure you check metal plates on both sides and check holes for best alignment. They don't exactly line up but are close enough to work. I did have to drill out one hole that was not cut clean. I did have to have help to hold the slats in while I tightened everything up. Took about 30 minutes total to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Ron May

customer_reviews.title: Will do the job!
customer_reviews.text: It was prefect for my daughters gift for her bedroom. Is super durable. I don’t let her jump on it because it definitely can break easily due to it being made of a low quality wood. Definitely great for a toddlers first time bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Raneisha Hattley

customer_reviews.title: Why is it so hard to put together?!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but the assembly was a NIGHTMARE!!!!!!!!!!! I don't know how we survived it... the holes are literally unaligned. Makes no sense We had to force it in some places. Omce put together its lovely
customer_reviews.author: PamV

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is very high quality and looks great. It was a little difficult to assemble as far as the bars across the bottom; you have to keep them all in place together at the same time which is impossible without two people, but once assembled, it’s very sturdy. I was happy I get a plain white bed so we can change out the bedding instead of a themed bed where you only have one option!
customer_reviews.author: MC11

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and well made
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for our 2 year old twin girls. They are absolutly adorable. They are the perfect size and seem pretty sturdy. I have no issues except during install. You have to drill several holes yourself and i was worried about drilling them in wrong. I would predrill them before shipping so not to cause issues. Other then the having to drill holes these are perfect and i would suggest them to anyone looking for toddler beds.
customer_reviews.author: Review King

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken, worst purchase in years
customer_reviews.text: The holes did not line up and the foot end arrived broken. I have tried to contact the seller for a replacement part to no avail. If everything lined up it would have been a breeze to put together. Listen to the other reviews about poor quality and difficult assembly and save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Trost

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, high pain in the butt
customer_reviews.text: None of the holes matched up. Some slots were too big for the cut out. The gap between the support leg and frame was 1/4 inch. The wooden dowels broke. This is one of my worst purchases from Amazon EVER. Low quality. Cheaper and higher quality from Walmart. Which is something I never thought I’d say!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: who decides to cut a bed in half?
customer_reviews.text: Update: 2 toddlers have used this bed since we bought it. It's not for adults to sit on, but it held up for our children who weighed over 32 lbs. before outgrowing it. Arrived on time, easy set up. Just remember its a toddler bed: Structurally not designed very well. If you know Ikea, then this is 2-3 grades below those products. The bed comes in half and is held together by dowels and pass through screws in the middle but the holes do not line up very well. Will it keep a mattress off the floor? Yes, but don't move it around or expect it to last beyond one child's use.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Valletta

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bed for the price! Took about an hour to assemble while I was multitasking and cooking dinner too. Only difficult part in assembling was keeping slats together with side rails. Definitely need two for that part. Also, there are eight screws that need pilot holes and I couldn't find my drill so I just tapped a nail lightly in each space and the screws went in fine. I did manage to snap the head off of one by overtightening and--luckily--there was an extra screw supplied so I just screwed thecreplscemt in right next to the snapped one. Lesson: don't even consider overtightening screws!
customer_reviews.author: Mazzymal

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed !
customer_reviews.text: Good price, sturdy bed. Just wish it would have been easier to put to together by myself. Make sure you have an extra set of hands to hold the wooden pieces that make up the base. They fall out easily while assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts, poor design
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts made assembly impossible. The long masters rail’s design features a connector plate held by for self drilling screws. When I assembled these side rails, neither formed a straight line. Install, each rail was slightly off angle from the other.
customer_reviews.author: Tom in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Holes do not line up. Inconsistent cuts for pieces.
customer_reviews.text: You can usually trust the Amazon Choice banner to steer you in the right direction. However this bed is the same terrible bed as the Orbelle toddler that I returned. The holes do not line up and cuts of the pieces are inconsistent so it makes impossible to assemble. Steer clear.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult assembly.
customer_reviews.text: The pieces were all intact. But you CANNOT assemble alone. You have to place all the slate in the grooves and hold it all together while putting the bolts in place. I spent over an hour trying to yoga pose myself in ways to hold it. It’s not possible. The product also seems very cheap. I doubt my daughter will have it long before it breaks. I don’t think it could even hold her weight.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Its a cute bed once assembled but not the easiest to assemble, dealing with the individual slates was a pain and one of the predrilled holes on one end was missing.
customer_reviews.author: des b

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: This is basically cardboard put together. My son has only had this bed for two months and it broke twice. After the second time I just couldn’t fix it the warranty is a joke I’m still waiting on a response from them. Save your money!!
customer_reviews.author: ILoveBooks

customer_reviews.title: A little difficult to put together, but super cute!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is super cute and it looks a lot nicer than your typical plastic toddler bed in my opinion. I gave this product 5 stars as we have not encountered any problems with it. The only think I would like to warn another buyer about is that it is a little difficult to put together. You need two people! But other than that if I you follow the instructions you and your second person will be okay. My daughter loves it and that it looks more grown up.
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, good customer service experience
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking toddler bed. Looks nicer than the price would suggest, which is great for a product you probably won't use for a lifetime. We were missing the middle support feet and the product was replaced quickly and without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Steph S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to put together. Perfect little bed for my daughter, she is almost 2 years old now. She loved it and is able to get in and out easily on her own.
customer_reviews.author: Itzel Carretero

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy toddler bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my three year old granddaughter. I wanted something that would last for a few years before she transitions into a regular twin bed. It turned out to be very sturdy, and she loved it. Her six foot tall muscular dad was even able to sit on it. It was a great value for the money. However, the bed did take two people to put it together in order to get the slats on the bottom to line up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Book Diva

customer_reviews.title: White Bed
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color and final product. It was easy to assemble. A few of the pieces didn’t line up correctly which led to a supporting middle foot being crooked. Other than that it has been a great bed. My daughter loves having one her size.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is so cute. The assembly I thought was quite simple and explained very well. I had no issues with missing parts or the need to drill extra holes. It's very sturdy to the point I can lay down with my grandson and read to him with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: M. Christian

customer_reviews.title: Want to be frustrated then assemble this bed
customer_reviews.text: Initial part of construction was ridiculous. 2 of the 4 dowels snapped & the self tapping screws didn't. What a nightmare. Assembly directions were written by someone who'd never assembled anything. Nice bed but not worth the effort. Try to find a company that has a little more foresight.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cantwell

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The frame split while installing the metal bracket. The bracket alignment is off by about 1/4" which is annoying. Also there are not pilot holes for the screws. Low quality material split while tightening the screws. Extremely dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: John Michael Petrilli

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy daughter loved it Well priced easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: When my daughter still use this bed it was excellent for her this is a great buy for that next step pretty easy to assemble fairly sturdy even for me and I weigh 215 lb definitely goodbye very cute
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: Great bed to transition from a crib for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money very sturdy and easy to put together my granddaughter loves the bed she is 2 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Cute but you will need a drill
customer_reviews.text: Just put this bed up today and it is so nice but it was a bit of a pain in the butt to put together. It says you only need to supply your own flat head screw driver but what it doesn't tell you is that you will probably need a drill because there are screws needed to put the middle legs on and the holes are not made for you. Other than that it is really sturdy and perfect height for little toddler legs!
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie Russell

customer_reviews.title: Instructions Online
customer_reviews.text: Other than having to find the instructions for assembly online for this product it was pretty easy assembly. My daughter is enjoying her big girl bed and it was definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Steelergrrl43

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! My daughter loves it and it was a really easy transition from a crib to a big girl bed. I put it together in about 45 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Khadijah Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Was fairly easy to assemble. The hardest part was the screws with not premade holes but it wasn’t so bad . I myself assembled. I’m 5’2 , 140lbs . And it wasn’t difficult at all . Very light , yet seems very strong . My daughter is a climber and I love how it’s low to the ground . And she jumps and does all type of crazy stuff and it seems very strong . Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for a toddler.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bed to use as a transition between crib and big bed. It's close to the ground and has good side rails, so unless your toddler moves around a good but in his sleep, there is little chance of rolling out of this bed. The style and available colors should work well in any room. Assembly was not easy, but then it never is for us. You will need at least two people to assemble this. The instructions were clear. The price was good. Our grandson really likes his big boy bed, and so do we.
customer_reviews.author: RSRW

customer_reviews.title: Such a great value!
customer_reviews.text: The cherry colored wood is Beautiful and goes great with my son's brightly colored toys. Assembly took me about 45 minutes, but it was simple and did not require any special skills or tools. My two year old LOVES his new bed, and I feel safe putting him to sleep with both railings on either side.
customer_reviews.author: Meghann

customer_reviews.title: Okay bed for the price
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped and arrived quickly but a few holes on the headboard wasn't completely drilled through so we had to finish drilling the holes before we could assemble the bed
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cute Toddler Bed
customer_reviews.text: Toddler Bed purchased for change from crib to bed. Nice bed, not plastic, cute design. Grandchild loves the bed. Looks nice in childs room.
customer_reviews.author: Jack L

customer_reviews.title: No assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: No assembly instructions! Are you kidding me! That is about as basic a mess up as you can get!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Clime

customer_reviews.title: Works great, good price
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this bed but so far, it seems good. I took a star off because the holes didn't align properly and my husband had to take a Dremel to the bed to make the screws line up. Other than that, the bed is sturdy and looks nice and clean for my toddler. Better yet, when my toddler transitions to a big bed, this bed will be ready for my daughter-it's gender neutral.
customer_reviews.author: Katuna

customer_reviews.title: Cute little bed
customer_reviews.text: Very cute bed and my 17 month old seems to like it. Very low to the ground and very light weight, so much so my child can move it around if desired. A little difficult to assemble single handed on some parts but not at all impossible. I did it by myself and in about an hour, I’m a girl. Over all I’m pretty happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad it's done!! I was ready to give up. The pieces should be labeled and directions should be clearer, that would of saved me alot of time, like an hour BUT I got it done and my 4 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: dequana

customer_reviews.title: Toddler bed
customer_reviews.text: The instructions on this bed are terrible . In the course of 7 hours we put this bed together and took it apart 7 times . Extremely frustrating , had to drill holes as some were not there . We finally got it together . I sure hope my granddaughter likes it for all the trouble it was . If my husband Had not been so patient , I would have thrown it out in the garbage ,.... you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Lee B Henriquez

customer_reviews.title: Good bed!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. It took a while to put together, and obviously isn’t a super high quality piece of furniture. But for a toddler bed that they’ll only use for like a year, it was a solid buy, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for the price and my purpose
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for the price and my purpose. My purpose is stay over @ Grandma's. It is sturdy for sleeping, climbing in and out, plus the occasional rough and tumble. It is pretty enough to put @ the foot of my bed. It went together easily, assembled it by myself but I am not new to do-it-yourself projects. I am very pleased with this purchase. Update: Owned this bed for two years and it is still in excellent shape. It gets used on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: betty bob

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Wood was warped
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Wood was warped, very hard to put together, nothing fit properly, had to bend and force everything to even make it work. Would return if it wasn’t such a hassle
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Uneven cuts and wrong predrilled hole placements
customer_reviews.text: I could not put my first bed together because the pieces were not cut to equal lengths and many of the predrilled holes were not where they were supposed to be. I encountered the same issue with the replacement bed. Luckily I was able to make it work by using pieces from each separate unit. The only plus side is that it is all solid wood. Would never order again.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give this 0 stars. I bought it because of the good reviews but this bed didn’t even come with the holes drilled and I don’t have a drill. I thought it was supposed to be easy assembly and it isn’t at all. Now I have to find a way to send the bed back. I’m very aggravated.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: My kid loved it!! It's easy to assemble and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Josue Jauregui.

customer_reviews.title: It’s not reliable!
customer_reviews.text: Be advised! This product is garbage and an absolute waste of money. I don’t understand why people give good ratings for a very poor quality product like this one. I really want to return it, but it’s too much work.
customer_reviews.author: kaleb

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: My husband said it was a pain to put together by himself. With that being said I love her new bed. We decided to buy my daughter a toddler bed because it fits nicely in our room. We decide to transition her into a toddler bed in our room first and it's perfect. I can see her using it for a very long time or until she decides to sleep in her twin size bed.
customer_reviews.author: AstridsMommy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent starter bed for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. My 8 y/o was happy to help me. Sturdy. Looks cute. Simple design. Fits most bedrooms in terms of decor. Size is as described. We had limited room for it and bought based on the size description and it fit exactly as it was described. It works. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: LunaSoleil1519

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Only giving this product three starts due to the fact that my order did not come with instructions. Seemed simple enough to start with up until a certain point..looked at three YouTube videos that did not help. In the end I googled instructions which I should have done first.
customer_reviews.author: Yani

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: It was not easy to assemble. But after you got over that, it’s a great bed! My son used it for 3 years and now my daughter is finishing up her second year using it! We just had a baby and plan on using it for him too! It’s sturdy but light. It’s a great transition from crib to big bed!
customer_reviews.author: Deena F

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a transition bed.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, but for a 25lb toddler, it will work. Less money to buy this bed than the toddler rail. Sold the crib, bought this bed. My toddler loves this!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price, really annoying to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I guess it’s ok for the price, but all around a huge pain to assemble (would be helpful to have an extra pair of hands) and the rails are kind of flimsy. It’ll be fine until we’re ready to get our son a twin bed.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my daughter’s room and is so pretty! She gasped in delight when we showed her the new big girl bed!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lester

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: We put my daughter in this at 13 months. The first night was the hardest. Shes now 17 months and sleeps in it like a pro. Husband had it together in under an hour. Its light weight. I was 8 months pregnant and switched it around. No issues with it in any way
customer_reviews.author: chelcy

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the bed amd my little girl loves it more. Was hard to assemble with one person but WELL worth the money. It is pretty darn sturdy. Had my 2 yr old and 4 yr old in it jumping around with NO issues.. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: brian h.

customer_reviews.title: ADORAA
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT!!! I bought this for my 2.5 year old granddaughter and she loves it This is such a cute toddler bed. Well made, packaged really well, and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and contemporary toddler bed!!
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to crib and is very sturdy and safe with built in side rails Assembly was easy and can be done in 30 mins or less Unfortunately the bed doesn’t last because of the size and how our daughter grew so fast out of it ! We maybe got 4 -6mos out of it
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for this bed, love it!
customer_reviews.text: This took about 20/30 minutes to assemble by myself. Very easy, just need a screw driver and the pieces included. Just make sure to line up the holes EXACTLY on the metal plate when you screw them in. Great for the price. I'm a thrifty shopper and this is significantly cheaper than other brands who sell literally the exact same bed.
customer_reviews.author: CBS

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler bed but has a wobble to it.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were also not very clear on how to assemble and the bed ended up being uneven and cant figure out how.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler bed!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great bed for starting your toddler out of the crib! Nice and low to the ground and it has sturdy side bars as well! Easy to assemble just read the instructions thoroughly before assembling because it can get a bit confusing as points. Overall a great bed!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: After less than a week the side rail screws are coming out. It also took a while to put together because everything has to line up perfectly but there are not guide hole for the legs
customer_reviews.author: sl

customer_reviews.title: A bit small
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Simple to assemble. For my 4 year old who is small for her age. She will grow out of it sooner than I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Shawntae

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fits under my daughter's bunk bed
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived a few days ago and my youngest daughter slept on it the first night. She snuggled right into her new bed and in her new room with her sister. It is sturdy enough for me to lay on as well though I avoid doing so. It fits perfectly underneath my oldest daughters' bunk bed too.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Toddler Bed!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this toddler bed. It's easy to clean and move. It goes together easily. It's close to the ground so if anybody rolled it would be safe, and the kids love it! It's one of the first toddler beds that weren't rejected in this house which is saying a lot! It is lightweight so if you need to move them room to room you can. If your babies get sick or they need to feel secure it's not hard to just move the beds. The frame is high quality and really sturdy. It will definitely last them until they get their twin beds! Twin beds for twins! I recommend this product 100%!!!
customer_reviews.author: Missy K.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed! Great quality, looks really nice. For the most part easy to put together but you do have to drill some holes with “self drilling screws”, and the wooden slates you need 2 people to help you hold everything together. Overall I am very happy with this bed. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Nice toddler bed
customer_reviews.text: This was an ideal bed for my grandbaby as she will soon be 1 years old. She has taken her naps in the bed while over with me. Also, I like the idea it is close to the floor she she does fall out of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Darnella Pearson-King

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bed but hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely bed however assembly I found needs two people. The slats kept falling out like they needed a clasp to keep them in long enough to get the bed together.
customer_reviews.author: CZeh17

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, we figured our toddler won’t use this too long before she goes to a big girl bed - so for the money it made perfect sense!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Geppert

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We had no issue with assembly, even with an excited toddler crawling all over us and a grumpy pregnant woman reading the directions. My son loves his new bed and I sit at the foot of it every night to read him stories.
customer_reviews.author: ReBekha

customer_reviews.title: you will need wine after to assemble it
customer_reviews.text: hard to put together it calls for a flat head screwdriver you need a cross tip (had to use a drill because the screws wouldn’t go in to the wood. once it’s together it’s okay
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my youngest child transitioning from a crib. I wouldn’t trust the sturdiness of it if my older kids decided to jump on it. And for its size it was not the easiest to assemble. Overall it’s not a bad value for the price but could be improved if it were made much sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: J.T. Haubner

customer_reviews.title: Gonna need a few hands!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed! It’s absolutely adorable and the perfect size for a growing toddler. I would say it’s easy to put together, however, because of how it goes together you’ll definitely want a partner to hold things while you put in the bolts! I did it alone and got the job done but struggled a bit just because I didn’t have enough hands. Overall a great bed! So far it seems very sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: So durable, easy to assemble. My distructive two year old loves her bed and it's easy for her to get in and out of her own bed and she is safe.
customer_reviews.author: harley7

customer_reviews.title: Worthless junk.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this negative stars I would. This is very poorly made with very flimsy thin boards for support and cheap hardware. This actually ended up in the burning bin as It broke while being assembled. There is no way it would hold up to an active toddler. Overall a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: inklover39

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect pieces
customer_reviews.text: This bed is adorable and easy to put together. However when putting it together I realized 2 of the 8 bed rails included were to big to fit into the designed slots. I put it together with 6 instead of 8 bed rails and am waiting to hear back from the company to see if they will rectify this situation.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, easy to assemble, and worth it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bed i got it for my son in white! Its sturdy because i lay in it with him he's 2! Perfect toddler bed for next step after the crib. Easy for my husband to assemble no problem. Its cute also im happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this bed, but when I opened it up it was damaged. Had to return it because why buy something new if it isn't going to look new before it even gets used?
customer_reviews.author: Caryn

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble alone
customer_reviews.text: You will need someone to help when it comes to putting the slats on the frame to hold the mattress. It is very close to the floor which can be good, but we thought it was going to be larger.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Instructions terrible, but good value
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were terrible, nothing was labeled, missing screw holes. I ended up just looking at picture and putting together. Bout in combination with Graco mattress and mattress pad which fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Exter

product_meta.title: Big Oshi Contemporary Design Toddler & Kids Bed - Sturdy Wooden Frame for Extra Safety - Modern Slat Design - Great for Boys and Girls - Full Bed Frame With Headboard, in White
product_meta.description: The Big Time Contemporary Design Toddler Day Bed is built of solid and elegant wood that is beautifully crafted to fit the size of your growing little toddler. The Big Time Contemporary Toddler Bed is precisely the right height and tailor made to meet stringent safety requirements for your enthusiastic and lively little toddler. The Big Time Contemporary Design Toddler bed comes compete with two side safety rails and makes a perfect transition for toddlers who have outgrown their small baby cribs. The Big Time Contemporary Day Bed puts the safety of your child first and uses safe non-toxic chemical lead and phthalate soft sheen finish that conforms to elegance, style and meets the ASTM safety standard requirements and safety regulations. The Big Time Contemporary Design Toddler Bed comes with all the easy to use necessary tools for assembly and the product height is 24.6 product width 30 product length 53.
feature_bullets: SAFETY FIRST! Toddler Bed – Two Side Safety Rails and Low to Ground Design for Safe and Easy Time Getting into or out of the bed
Sturdy Wooden Frame, Made of High Quality Pine Wood for Extra Safety and Sturdiness
Easy to Assemble, DIY Full Bed Frame, Including Headboard
Perfect Size to use as a Toddler Bed or Kids Bed
Gender Neutral Design: Fits Perfectly in Either Girls or Boys Room
Recommended Weights – Minimum: 35 Pounds, Maximum: 60 Pounds
